title: Audit 2/20: Debate and consensus
description: Auditor 2: Read previous 1 audit(s), debate conclusions, update consensus tracker for all 45 types.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Read ALL previous audit essays: AUDIT-001
For EACH of the 45 sample types: agree or disagree with previous consensus
If disagreeing, provide counter-arguments with evidence from research papers
Update consensus tracker: docs.local/audit/consensus-tracker.md with current vote counts
